Class BraKet

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.quantum.BraKet
public class BraKet extends Object
Represents a quantum state using Dirac notation.

A `Ket` $|\psi\rangle$ is a column vector. A `Bra` $\langle\psi|$ is a row vector (conjugate transpose).

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • basis

      public static BraKet basis(int basisIndex, int dimension)
      Creates a standard basis Ket $|0\rangle$ or $|1\rangle$.
      Parameters:
      basisIndex - 0 or 1 usually
      dimension - usually 2 for qubit

    • dual

      public BraKet dual()
      Returns the dual (conjugate transpose). $|\psi\rangle^\dagger = \langle\psi|$

    • dot

      public Complex dot(BraKet other)
      Inner product $\langle\phi|\psi\rangle$. Only valid if this is a Bra and other is a Ket.

    • tensor

      public BraKet tensor(BraKet other)
      Tensor product $|\psi\rangle \otimes |\phi\rangle$.
